ctx: Venz v10pro plus 60 evrov cena ni zadnja
content:
Pozdravljeni

Prodaja se Venz v10pro plus, kupljen preko extremdigital doatavljen s kurirsko sluzbo dpd.
Zraven dobite original skatlo, adapter, daljinec,navodila in napravo, racun garancije ima 3 leta

Naprava je stara dva meseca
Connections
• 1 x HDMI 2.0 A out
• 3 x USB ports (1, 2 Host OTG)
• 1 x Ethernet LAN port RJ-45 10/100Mbs
• 1 x AV Output
• 1 x Optical audio output
• 1 x slot for microSD
• 1 x Power Connector
Technical Specifications
• Chipset/Processor - Amlogic s912/Octa Core ARM Cortex A53 64 bit up to 2 GHz
• GPU - Dual Core ARM mali-t830 up to 750 MHz (DVFS)
• Memory - 2 GB of RAM DDR4
• Internal memory - 16 gb eMMC Flash
• Wireless - Dual Band 2.4 GHz and 5.8 GHz 802.11 ac/b/g/n WiFi, Bluetooth receiver 4.1
• Video Output: HDMI 2.0 port up to 4 K UHD @ 60fps
• Audio Output: HDMI 2.0 A, optical output, 2 channel stereo output
• Power supply: ACS DC SPS 5 V/2 A (FCC, CE, CCC certified)
• Support video: 720p, 1080i, 1080p FHD, 3d mode, UHD 4 K @ 60fps 10-bit
• Decoder Format: 10-bit vp9 - 10 profile-2 up to 4 K * 2 K @ 60fps, H.265 HEVC, H.264 AVC 4 K * 2 K @ 30fps, H.264 MVC up to 1080p @ 60fps vp9, AVS +, MPEG1/2/4 ASP, WMV/VC-1, RealVideo8/9/10
• Video formats: MKV, WMV, MOV, MP4, AVI, MPG, MPEG, DAT, VOB, FLV, 3 GP, DIVX, F4 V, ASF, M2 V, DAT, AVI, MOV, ISO, RM
• Music formats: Audio MP3, AAC, WMA, WAV, OGG, M4 A, MP4, AAC, APE, FLAC, Dolby and DTS
• Image formats: JPG, MJPEG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIFF, GIF
• Subtitle Formats: Sub, SMI, SSA, SRT, IDX + SUB
• Networking features: PPPoE, VPN, portable Wi-Fi hotspot, sharing, Samba, DLNA
• File System Support: ext3, FAT32, NTFS
• USB 2.0 Host: A USB host * 2 and a USB OTG * 1
• Network: RJ45 Socket for cable support LAN Speed at 1000 Mbps (Gigabit LAN)
• Operating system: Android 7.1.2
Cena naprave 60 evrov cena ni zadnja

Kontak preko zasebnega sporocila ali mail majcen.stanislav@hotmail.com ali na 031750550

Hvala
author: Stankec
